title: Ned's Newt - The Complete Series - 1997-1999 - DivX
description:
Ned&#039;s Newt!

Seasons 1, 2 and 3 of the Ned&#039;s Newt animated series, 1997-1999, full NTSC (712x480) in DivX. Starring the voice talent of stand-up comedian Harland Williams.

Young Ned Flemkin gets his allowance and decides to buy the best pet a boy could ever have.  When $1.65 doesn&#039;t seem to be enough to afford an elephant, Ned settles for a sleepy blue newt and names him Newton.  However, Newton turns out to be a very boring pet so the pet shop owner suggests "Zippo for Newt" pet food to perk the little guy up, but DON&#039;T GIVE HIM TOO MUCH!

As it turns out, eating too much Zippo has the unusual effect of transforming Newton into an enormous, shape-shifting, wise-cracking monstrosity, and a source of never-ending trouble for Ned.  But at the same time, Newton really does become the best pet a boy could ever have.

"Don&#039;t buy a reliable, devoted newt! Oh, no! Get one of these indifferent, rat-dragging, sofa-shredders who&#039;ll fill the catbox just as you&#039;re having breakfast! Yum! Won&#039;t *that* go great with your waffle?"
  - Newton
